alert.note: Alert for Eddy (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 7:22PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nelson, northwestern Griggs and southeastern Eddy Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 722 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Tolna, or 31 miles southeast of Devils Lake, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... McVille, Red Willow Lake, Pekin, Mose and Tolna. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
